description: Lead Funnel Session Zero Magnet - Audio lead magnet for undecided landing page visitors

userStories.title: Create listen page with audio player
userStories.description: As an email recipient, I want to access a dedicated listen page with an audio player so that I can hear Session Zero in a focused environment.
acceptanceCriteria: Page exists at /listen route
Page displays headline 'Before you decide anything, hear this.'
Page displays subhead '5 minutes. Headphones help.'
Audio player is visible and centered on page
Audio player loads /audio/session-zero.mp3
Page has noindex, nofollow meta tag
Page uses brand styling (deep teal gradient background, Inter font)
'Unhooked' text in header area links to homepage
Simple footer with '© 2026 Unhooked'
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Browser verification skipped - no dev-browser skill configured

userStories.title: Add placeholder audio file
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a placeholder audio file so that I can test the listen page functionality.
acceptanceCriteria: Create public/audio/ directory
Add session-zero.mp3 placeholder file (can be silent or short test audio)
Audio file is accessible at /audio/session-zero.mp3
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: 5-second silent MP3 placeholder generated with ffmpeg

userStories.title: Add debug mode for listen page
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a debug mode that shows all page stages immediately so that I can test without waiting for timers.
acceptanceCriteria: Adding ?debug=true to URL shows all stages (audio, bridge, CTAs) immediately
Debug mode only affects local display, not analytics
Without debug param, normal staged reveal behavior applies
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Browser verification skipped - no dev-browser skill configured. Debug mode implemented with isDebugMode computed property from route.query.debug.

userStories.title: Add bridge content reveal after audio ends
userStories.description: As an email recipient who finishes the audio, I want to see follow-up content that explains what I just heard.
acceptanceCriteria: Bridge section hidden on initial page load
Bridge section appears after audio 'ended' event fires
Bridge section uses fade-in animation (300-400ms)
Bridge headline: 'That belief—that quitting requires willpower—is just one of five.'
Bridge copy mentions four more illusions without listing specifics
Page auto-scrolls to bring bridge section into view
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Browser verification skipped - no dev-browser skill configured. Implemented audio ended event listener with auto-scroll to bridge section.

userStories.title: Add 30-second fallback timer for content reveal
userStories.description: As an email recipient who starts but doesn't finish the audio, I want to eventually see the CTAs so I can still take action.
acceptanceCriteria: 30-second timer starts when audio play begins
Timer is wall-clock time (doesn't pause when audio pauses)
Bridge + CTA sections appear after 30 seconds if audio hasn't ended
Once revealed, sections stay visible (don't hide on audio replay)
Sections remain hidden if user never presses play
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Implemented wall-clock fallback timer using setTimeout. Timer starts on first play event and cannot be restarted. Timer is cleaned up on component unmount.

userStories.title: Add primary CTA to checkout on listen page
userStories.description: As an email recipient ready to purchase, I want a clear button to become a founding member.
acceptanceCriteria: Primary CTA section appears with bridge content
Headline above button: 'Ready to see the rest?'
Button displays 'Become a founding member — $199 →'
Button uses existing CheckoutButton component
Clicking initiates Stripe checkout flow directly
Subtext shows '30-day guarantee · Start when the program launches'
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Integrated LandingCheckoutButton component with tracking-location='listen'. Added CTA_CLICK_LISTEN event to analytics.

userStories.title: Add secondary CTA to landing page on listen page
userStories.description: As an email recipient who wants more information, I want a link to read the full landing page.
acceptanceCriteria: Secondary CTA section appears below primary CTA
Headline: 'Want to learn more first?'
Link text is 'Read the full story →'
Link navigates to /?ref=listen (includes attribution param)
Link styled as text link, not button (visually quieter than primary)
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Already implemented in US-003. Verified all acceptance criteria met: section appears below primary CTA, headline matches, link text matches, navigates to /?ref=listen, styled as text link with underline.

userStories.title: Track email source on listen page
userStories.description: As a product owner, I want to know which email drove each listen page visit.
acceptanceCriteria: Page reads 'src' query parameter on load
Valid values: welcome, followup, or defaults to 'direct' if missing
Source value stored in component state for use in analytics
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Update Path B copy on landing page
userStories.description: As an undecided landing page visitor, I want to see compelling copy about a free audio experience.
acceptanceCriteria: Headline changed from 'Not ready yet?' to 'Still thinking about it?'
Body copy updated to universal audio magnet copy (no career assumptions)
Copy only shows when checkoutEnabled is true (validation/enabled modes)
Waitlist copy unchanged for disabled mode
Button text remains 'Send it to me'
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Update welcome email for audio funnel
userStories.description: As a new email subscriber (when checkout is available), I want to receive an email with the audio link.
acceptanceCriteria: Email sent when appMode is 'validation' or 'enabled'
Email is plain text format (not HTML)
Subject line: 'Here's the audio I promised'
Body includes link to https://getunhooked.app/listen?src=welcome
Body matches spec copy (brief, personal, includes 'save this email' permission)
From address: 'Kevin from Unhooked <kevin@getunhooked.app>'
Waitlist email unchanged for 'disabled' mode
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add listen location to CheckoutButton tracking
userStories.description: As a product owner, I want checkout clicks from the listen page to be tracked separately.
acceptanceCriteria: CheckoutButton component accepts 'listen' as a valid tracking location
CTA_CLICK_LISTEN event fires when primary CTA clicked on listen page
Event includes email_source property
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Track audio playback events
userStories.description: As a product owner, I want to track when users start and complete the audio.
acceptanceCriteria: AUDIO_STARTED event fires when play button pressed
AUDIO_COMPLETED event fires when audio reaches end
Both events include email_source property (welcome/followup/direct)
Events sent to Plausible via existing analytics composable
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Track secondary CTA clicks on listen page
userStories.description: As a product owner, I want to track when users click the secondary CTA to learn more.
acceptanceCriteria: SECONDARY_CTA_CLICK event fires when 'Read the full story' link clicked
Event includes email_source property
Event sent to Plausible
Typecheck passes
